ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.BIO_P1: My journey began studying Physics, driven by a curiosity to understand how things work. In parallel, I taught myself programming, an interest that quickly turned into a passion and led me to fully transition my career towards software engineering. I graduated with a Technical Degree in Programming from UTN, establishing a solid foundation in modern development practices.
ABOUT.BIO_P2: I have experience building RESTful APIs with Spring Boot, frontend development with Angular, applying design patterns, clean architecture, and agile methodologies within multidisciplinary teams. I enjoy tackling complex problems and transforming them into scalable and maintainable solutions.
ABOUT.BIO_P3: My curiosity and proactivity constantly push me to dive deep into Research and Development (R&D) in unknown areas. This has led me to tackle challenging projects, ranging from video game modding and reverse engineering to the implementation of RAG models integrating Artificial Intelligence.
